description:
As a poker player
  I want to verify the integrity of card shuffling
  So that I can trust the fairness of the game

elements.name: Generate and display card order hash before game starts

steps.name: the card order transparency system is enabled
I am directly on the game page with test data
I start a new poker game
a card order hash should be generated before dealing
the hash should be displayed to all players
the card order should be stored in the database
the card order should initially be unrevealed
the card order transparency system is enabled
I am directly on the game page with test data
there are multiple completed games with card orders
I request the latest card orders via API
I should receive up to 10 card order records
each record should contain game ID, hash, and reveal status
revealed records should include the actual card order
unrevealed records should hide the card order details
the card order transparency system is enabled
I am directly on the game page with test data
there are completed games with revealed card orders
I request to download the card order history
I should receive a CSV file with card order data
the CSV should contain game ID, hash, seed, and card sequence
only revealed card orders should be included in the download
the card order transparency system is enabled
I am directly on the game page with test data
a game has been completed with revealed card order
I verify the card order using the original hash
the verification should confirm the card order is authentic
the computed hash should match the stored hash
the card sequence should be verifiable against the seed

elements.name: Automatic card order reveal after game completion

steps.name: the card order transparency system is enabled
I am directly on the game page with test data
I have 2 players already seated:
the game starts and progresses to completion
the card order should be automatically revealed
players should be notified of the card order revelation
the card order should become publicly viewable
the card order transparency system is enabled
I am directly on the game page with test data
a game has been completed with revealed card order
I attempt to verify with an incorrect hash
the verification should fail
the system should indicate hash mismatch
the actual vs expected hashes should be shown
the card order transparency system is enabled
I am directly on the game page with test data
a specific seed is used for card shuffling
the same seed is used to regenerate the deck
the card order should be identical
the hash should match the original
the shuffle should be reproducible
the card order transparency system is enabled
I am directly on the game page with test data
the poker system is running
I access the card order transparency endpoints
I should be able to get latest card orders
I should be able to get card orders by game ID
I should be able to download card order history
I should be able to verify card order hashes
all endpoints should return proper error handling

name: Card Order Transparency System

description:
As a poker player
  I want to login, join a table, and take seats
  So that I can participate in the poker game

elements.name: Complete flow from anonymous visitor to seated player

steps.name: I am on the poker lobby page
tables are loaded and visible
I am browsing anonymously
I am not logged in

I click start playing without entering nickname

the online users count should be updated to reflect my login
the online users count should increase by 1
all join table buttons become active now
I click one join table button
I should be on the game page
I should see "TestPlayer" in the observers list
I should not see "TestPlayer" in the players list
"TestPlayer" should appear exactly once in the observers list
"TestPlayer" should appear exactly zero times in the players list
I take an available seat "1"
seat "1" should be in taken state

"TestPlayer" should appear exactly zero times in the observers list
I take another available seat "3"
seat "1" should return to available state
seat "3" should be in taken state
I should see "TestPlayer" in the players list at seat "3"
I should not see "TestPlayer" at seat "1"
"TestPlayer" should appear exactly once in the players list
"TestPlayer" should appear exactly zero times in the observers list
the players list should reflect this seat change
I take another available seat "1"
seat "3" should return to available state
seat "1" should be in taken state
I should see "TestPlayer" in the players list at seat "1"
I should not see "TestPlayer" at seat "3"
"TestPlayer" should appear exactly once in the players list
"TestPlayer" should appear exactly zero times in the observers list

name: Login, Join Table, and Take Seats

description:
As a poker player
  I want to play poker and observe multiplayer game mechanics
  So that I can experience the full poker game flow

elements.name: Complete poker game flow from UI perspective

steps.name: I am directly on the game page with test data
I have 5 players already seated:
all 5 players should be seated at the table
each player should have their correct chip count
players should be visible in their seats and in the players list
each player should be verified in their correct seat with proper order
I wait for the poker game interface to load
I should see the poker table with all UI elements
I should see my player information displayed correctly
the game starts and preflop betting begins
the current player should have betting options available
I should be able to interact with betting buttons
"TestPlayer1" performs a "call" action
the action should be reflected in the UI
the pot amount should update to "15"
the turn should move to "TestPlayer2"
"TestPlayer2" performs a "raise" action with amount "30"
the raise should be processed via UI
"TestPlayer2" chip count should decrease to "120"
the current bet should be "30"
the turn should move to "TestPlayer3"
the chip count change should be visible in the UI
"TestPlayer3" performs a "fold" action
"TestPlayer3" should be marked as folded
the turn should move to "TestPlayer4"
"TestPlayer4" performs a "call" action with amount "30"
"TestPlayer4" chip count should decrease to "220"
the turn should move to "TestPlayer5"
"TestPlayer5" performs a "call" action with amount "30"
"TestPlayer5" chip count should decrease to "150"
the turn should move back to "TestPlayer1"
"TestPlayer1" performs a "call" action with amount "20"
"TestPlayer1" chip count should decrease to "180"
the preflop betting round should be complete
the total pot should reflect all player contributions
the flop is dealt with 3 community cards
I should see 3 community cards displayed
the cards should be visually rendered correctly
the phase indicator should show "flop"
the flop betting round begins
"TestPlayer1" should be first to act
"TestPlayer1" performs a "check" action
"TestPlayer2" performs a "bet" action with amount "20"
"TestPlayer4" performs a "call" action with amount "20"
"TestPlayer5" performs a "fold" action
"TestPlayer1" performs a "call" action with amount "20"
the flop betting round should be complete
3 players should remain active
the turn card is dealt
I should see 4 community cards displayed
the phase indicator should show "turn"
the turn betting round begins
"TestPlayer1" performs a "check" action
"TestPlayer2" performs a "check" action
"TestPlayer4" performs a "check" action
the turn betting round should be complete
the river card is dealt
I should see 5 community cards displayed
the phase indicator should show "river"
the river betting round begins
"TestPlayer1" performs a "check" action
"TestPlayer2" performs a "bet" action with amount "40"
"TestPlayer4" performs a "fold" action
"TestPlayer1" performs a "call" action with amount "40"
the river betting round should be complete
the showdown phase begins
the remaining players' cards should be revealed
the winner should be determined
the pot should be awarded to the winner
the game should display final results
all player chip counts should be accurate
the pot display should show correct final amount
the game controls should be properly disabled
the winner celebration should be displayed

name: Multiplayer Poker Game Round
